Package entity

Class Student

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Student
public class Student
extends User
Student represents a student in the school.

      public void createStudent​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String salt, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String matriculationNumber, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String email)

      password - password of student
      salt - salt used in hashing
      name - name of the student

      gender - gender of the student
      nationality - nationality of the student
      email - email of the student

    • timeOverlap

      public boolean timeOverlap​(java.lang.String startTime1, java.lang.String endTime1, java.lang.String startTime2, java.lang.String endTime2)
      Checks if there is any time overlap between 2 courses that would affect the schedule.
      Parameters:
      startTime1 - startTime of session 1
      endTime1 - endTime of session 1
      startTime2 - startTime of session 2
      endTime2 - endTime of session 2
      Returns:
      true if time overlaps, else return false if time does not overlap.

    • hasClashingSchedule

      public boolean hasClashingSchedule​(Course course) throws java.io.IOException
      Checks if there is any clashes in the student's current schedule after adding the Course to be added
      Parameters:
      course - Course to be added
      Returns:
      true if there is clash, else return false if there is no clash.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if I/O exception occurs

      Checks if course is taken by the student based on the input course index.
      Parameters:
      courseIndex - courseIndex
      Returns:
      true if the course is found in the database of that student, else return false if it is not found in the student's database.

    • removeStudentsFromWaitList

      public java.lang.String removeStudentsFromWaitList​(java.lang.String courseIndex, int availableSlots) throws java.io.IOException
      Removes student from waitlist if there is a space after another student has dropped the course.
      Parameters:
      courseIndex - course Index of course to remove student from
      availableSlots - no. of available slots
      Returns:
      "Waitlist updated accordingly." if successful, return "Error updating waitlist." otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if I/O exception occurs

      message - message to be sent in email
      Returns:
